sys_script_include.description: Performs a Glide Aggregate and returns the proper aggregate value Required Parms: table - a system table to perform the query query - and encoded query string aggregate - the aggregate type to calculate Example: var attendeeCount = new EventRegistrationAggregate().runAggregate('x_snc_we_volunteer_attendee', 'attendee_status=confirmed^event_name=4ca44ac8853c2010f8772d87b5990103', 'COUNT');
sys_script_include.name: EventRegistrationAggregate
